We help enrich the lives of all people with learning disabilities.

Elmbridge Mencap supports children and adults who have learning disabilities, together with their parents and carers in the Elmbridge and surrounding areas. We are here to offer help and advice in a practical way.

ABOUT ELMBRIDGE MENCAP

Our regular activities

We run activities and clubs at Burview Hall for children and adults with learning disabilities. Below are a few regular activites we run.
VIEW WHAT’S ON
  • Youth Club
    Alternate Wednesday evenings 7-9pm
    An activity club for young people aged 16—25 with learning disabilities. Alternate Wednesdays 7-9pm.
  • Nova Club
    Alternative Wednesday evenings 7-9pm
    A social club for adults with learning disabilities at the hall from 7-9pm on alternate Wednesdays
  • One to One Club
    Thursday evenings 7:30-9pm
    A fun activity social club for adults with learning disabilities
  • Cinema Nights
    Monthly on a Saturday evening
    Held at the hall once a month for adults with learning disabilites.
  • Family Fun
    Monthly on a saturday afternoon
    These sessions are for set up for families who have a disabled child, or children, to attend as a family, with any siblings, giving them the opportunity to socialise and enjoy the facilities at the Hall.

Burview Hall

The building has a large hall with kitchen, a games room and two sensory rooms providing sensory tactile areas. These are particularly beneficial for children and adults with profound learning disabilities. They can be hired on an hourly basis by groups, schools or individuals, providing a benefit to those with a learning or other disability.

MORE ABOUT THE HALL

Subscribe and follow on our social media platforms

We do not receive any support/subsidies from Mencap. We wholly rely on income from hall lettings, fundraising activities, membership subscriptions, donations and grant awards. Please consider using the EASYFUNDRAISING website to buy anything online. You can also use smile.amazon.co.uk to donate 0.5% of your Amazon purchases - many thanks!

Want to join Elmbridge Mencap?

We have a board of trustees that meet regualarly, and a few members of staff to help keep Elmbridge Mencap running. Want to join our team?
